alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:06PM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...SNOWY AND WINDY CONDITIONS CONTINUE... .Gusty winds and snow will continue to produce difficult travel conditions through early this evening over portions of western and south central South Dakota, the Black Hills, and far northeastern Wyoming. Falling and blowing snow will cause reduced visibility and slippery road conditions as the snow gradually moves from west to east across the area. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...In South Dakota, the Northern Foot Hills, Harding County, Butte County and the Northern Black Hills. In Wyoming, the Wyoming Black Hills and Northeastern Crook County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
